name: Hostage (itch) (Tessla34)
description: This is a horror game about a police security bot going into a hostage situation and trying to save the hostage. The bot has no way to see, except the security camera feeds that are being sent to the bot. You can switch between the feeds with the top number keys and the minus sign. The bot moves with  w  a  s  and  d. Find the hostage, avoid the beast, and save the day.
